comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: OP if your complaint (indirectly) is that those accounts are related farmed accounts, the best place to make that complaint should beKnown Alts of any-one. There are users there who are gifted and will be willing to dot the "i"s and cross the "t"s for you, speedily.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: I think what said by: @Timelord2067 has a point.OP, just wasting time on the Alt investigation that he did, as I can see 5 accounts posted by OP here are Archived. maybe everything.Example:1. https://bpip.org/Profile?p=burky156 (Archived)2. https://bpip.org/Profile?p=larrylegend34 (Archived)3. https://bpip.org/Profile?p=erifubirugen (Archived)4. https://bpip.org/Profile?p=etsonarrantes (Archived)5. https://bpip.org/Profile?p=larrylegend33 (Archived)I don't think this thread fits here, but its place is here: Topic: [Report] Ban Evasion [Requesting Admin/mod to check those and ban], it will be more interesting, if OP finds other Alts that are still active, they can be categorized as Ban evasion.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: I wouldn't mind the glow tag if it was a softer colour like yellow or orange.As to the height and width ...Code:[img width=400]image.jpg[/img]See how with just one value you can control the height and width of an image?

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on March 03, 2023, 04:53:36 PM~See how with just one value you can control the height and width of an image?Well, it looks like the OP did only used one value... but, just the wrong one.@Fuso.hp, my suggestion would be to replace "height" with "width" in the [image] tags. Your post will look much better that way.
